Name: WarLeague
About the game: Discord : The game supports cross-platform play. Currently, the mobile terminal supports the Android platform. The mobile phone and PC are intercommunication, which is convenient for players to experience anytime and anywhere All of your favorite characters are likely to be assembled here, and you can mix and match whatever combinations you want to create the element of surprise. League Bros. is a super top card battle game, the original self move 2.0 mode, let you have a different experience every battle A massive legion battle Through card combination, the number of troops can be continuously expanded, and up to 1,000 people can be supported in real-time combat on the same screen, which truly restores the RTS battle scene A kaleidoscope of matchups Legions of different races and artifact skills match. Each one requires the commander to complete a fantastic combination of fighting forces based on different artifacts and race classes to overcome all opponents A variety of game modes, experience different fun Level mode: PVE, suitable for casual and fragmented time players, unlimited time, save system, ensure that each turn can be suspended the game, work fish preferred mode Arena mode: PVP fair competition, including single row and double row, invite friends to open black, ladder leaderboard, 8 people a game, the last person to eat chicken, tension and excitement
